name: Alfa-compiler
body:
### Alfa Compiler
Compiler in C using Flex and Bison as analytical auxiliar tools. Automatic generation of x86 assembly language executable code (.asm). This project was done for the PAUTLEN subject in the Universidad Aut√≥noma de Madrid.


### Alfa Features
The supported language included:
-Simple variables (boolean, integrer)
-Vectors
-Loops
-Conditionals
-Arithmetical and logical operations
-Functions
-Errors detections



### Authors and Contributors
@jorge95ruiz
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
